mapper.select: select ID,USERID,CERTNAME,CERTNUMBER,GRADE, TO_CHAR(AQUIREDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as AQUIREDDATE, TO_CHAR(EXPDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as EXPDATE, CERTTYPE,FILEID,ORGNAME,CERTCOMMENTS from Certifications where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update Certifications set certName = #{certName}, certNumber = #{certNumber}, aquiredDate = #{aquiredDate}, grade = #{grade}, expDate = #{expDate}, certtype = #{certtype}, fileId = #{fileId}, orgName = #{orgName}, certComments = #{certComments} where USERID = #{userId} and id = #{id}
